sentences.en: A cliche, I know, and until then I had not grasped what that feels like.
sentences.cn: 我知道过于陈词滥调，但是我知道我已经抓不住那种感觉了。

sentences.en: And I know it's totally cliche to say this.
sentences.cn: 我知道这么说完全是陈词滥调.

sentences.en: Avoid slang 、 cliche and informal words.
sentences.cn: 避免俚语、腔滥调和非正式用字.

sentences.en: Cliche is a feature of bad journalism.
sentences.cn: 使用套语是拙劣的新闻体的特点.

sentences.en: Enjoy your life when you're young – it's a true cliche that you only have your youth once – but work harder than most people think you should.
sentences.cn: 当你年轻时，享受你的生活— 因为青春只有一次，这是陈词滥调— 但别忘了要比别人想象的更努力工作。

sentences.en: He preluded with some cliche.
sentences.cn: 他一开场便是老生常谈.

sentences.en: His article is stuffed with cliche & 1 & .
sentences.cn: 他的文章中满是一些 陈词滥调.

sentences.en: His article is stuffed with cliche.
sentences.cn: 他的文章中满是一些陈词滥调。

sentences.en: It has become a cliche to describe Asia-Pacific as the world's most dynamic economic area.
sentences.cn: 亚太地区是世界上最具经济活力的地区这种话是老生常谈了。

sentences.en: It'sounds like a cliche, but that's the real necessity.
sentences.cn: 这听起来像一句老生常谈, 但它却是真正的必要条件.

sentences.en: Its simplistic psychology is illustrated by the new cliche of the date-rape furor:" 'No' always means 'no'.
sentences.cn: 对于约会强奸的新版陈词滥调可以说明存在其中的简单心理特征：“‘不’总是意味着‘不’”。

sentences.en: Life is not composed by aphorism, how can we decorate it with pompous cliche & 1 & s? I send you my most sincere greeting in silence.
sentences.cn: 人生并非格言组成,岂能靠美丽的 辞章 来妆点, 默默中,有我对你最诚挚的祝福.

sentences.en: Of course, that a cliche by now and has been for decades.
sentences.cn: 当然, 那现在是铅板和是在数十年.

sentences.en: Sounds like a cliche , but it really works.
sentences.cn: 听上去是陈词滥调, 却很.

sentences.en: The articles in this newspaper are full of cliche.
sentences.cn: 这张报纸里的文章充满陈词滥调.

sentences.en: The old cliche is certainly true: the bigger car do mean bigger profits.
sentences.cn: 有句老话倒的确说得不假: 车大利大.

sentences.en: There is plenty of truth in the cliche that a trouble shared is a trouble halved.
sentences.cn: “有人分担，烦恼减半”这句老话说得很有道理。

sentences.en: To use a well-worn cliche, it is packed with information.
sentences.cn: 说得老套一点，其内容翔实。

sentences.en: What the boss said at the meeting is a cliche.
sentences.cn: 老总在大会上讲的都是一些浮辞滥调.

sentences.en: You should always try to avoid the use of cliche.
sentences.cn: 你应该尽量避免使用陈词滥调.

words.tran_cn: 陈词滥调；[印刷]铅版；陈腐思想

trans.tran_en: an idea or phrase that has been used so much that it is not effective or does not have any meaning any longer
